net.sf.ehcache.config
Class ConfigurationHelper

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.ehcache.config.ConfigurationHelper

public final class ConfigurationHelper
extends java.lang.Object

The configuration for ehcache.

This class can be populated through:

  • introspection by ConfigurationFactory or
  • programmatically

Version:
$Id: ConfigurationHelper.java 608 2008-05-04 03:32:51Z gregluck $
Author:
Greg Luck
